mapper.select: SELECT DATE(created_at) AS sale_date, SUM(total_price) AS total_sales, COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) AS sales_count FROM ORDERS WHERE created_at BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND order_status != 4 GROUP BY DATE(created_at) ORDER BY sale_date ASC

SELECT p.product_name AS productName, SUM(od.price * od.quantity) AS totalSales, SUM(od.quantity) AS quantitySold, p.image_url AS imageUrl FROM ORDERS o JOIN ORDER_DETAIL od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN PRODUCT p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.created_at BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND o.order_status != 4 GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_name, p.image_url ORDER BY totalSales DESC LIMIT 5 OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT p.product_id FROM ORDERS o JOIN ORDER_DETAIL od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN PRODUCT p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.created_at BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND o.order_status != 4 GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_name, p.image_url ) AS subquery
